name: Tamahar Trust
briefDescription: Tamahar will strive to bring, up-to-date knowledge and latest technology from all over India and the world and make it available to all deserving children across India.Tamahar’s programs intend to bring sunshine to the lives and families of children with special needs.We offer several different services including Occupational Therapy, Special Education, NLP, Pranic Healing, Manual muscle work etc. Combined with our school and pre-school programs, support activities and ever-growing vocational trainings and therapies, we hope to improve the quality of life for children with special requirements.We are on this journey to bring about change in the life of every child – because for them this is the one and only life they will ever have.
